title: Anke Domscheit-Berg - Wikipedia
snippet: Her mandate ended in 2025 because she did not run for re-election. Previously, she was a member of the Pirate Party Germany and the Greens. She is married to Daniel Domscheit-Berg. Anke Domscheit-Berg grew up as daughter of an art historian and a doctor in Müncheberg, East Germany.

title: Anke Domscheit-Berg | The Guardian
snippet: Anke Domscheit-Berg is chairwoman of the State of Brandenburg Pirate Party and a candidate for the Bundestag at the upcoming elections. She is an open government activist, consultant and writer

title: Anke Domscheit-Berg
snippet: She has been a member of the Bundestag since 2017, when she was elected on the party list of The Left, without being a party member. She joined the party in 2021 following her nomination to the top female position on the party election list ...

title: Anke Domscheit-Berg | NEXT Conference
snippet: Anke Domscheit-Berg is member of the Pirate Party and regional party leader of the PIRATEN Brandenburg. As longtime activist and journalist, she is specializing in upheavals due to the digital…
